devdoc.details: DID Ledger for the SelfKey DID method. A DID is controlled by their creator address by default, but control can be assigned to any different adddress by their current controller.

params._metadata: — Arbitrary 32-byte data field. Can be later changed by their owner.

deleteDID(bytes32).details: Remove DID. Only callable by DID controller.

getController(bytes32).details: Returns corresponding controller for given DID

params.id: — The identifier (DID) to be resolved to its controller address

setController(bytes32,address).details: Change controller address. Only callable by current DID controller.

setMetadata(bytes32,bytes32).details: Update DID metadata. Only callable by DID controller.

params._metadata: — Arbitrary 32-byte value to be assigned as metadata.

devdoc.title: DIDLedger
